Control Name: 5.2.6 External or internal audits of this workload are performed periodically.
Control Statement: Compliance is important for several reasons. Aside from signifying levels of standards, like ISO 27001 and others, noncompliance with regulatory guidelines may bring sanctions and penalties.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.2 What considerations for compliance and governance did you make in this workload?
